title: E262 The Quadratic Formula for Our Crushes and AIM Screen Name Numerology
description: She's baaaaa-aaaaack! Our favorite trashy-classy goddess has returned from her parental leave and we're clocking a 1000/10 on the numerology attitude chart! To mark the occasion, Em takes us on a journey from dumpster fires to deities and reads all of our numerology charts, including Leona's, then gives us the history of numerology itself. Then Christine covers the disappearance of Patti Adkins and we learn that the jig is up, not the gig. And be sure to look out for visitors from beyond... Burbank... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schieffer, Eva Gross)
